name: Five Nights at Expunged
description: Welcome to the 3D Hut! You have been accepted into a job as a late night security guard. All you need to do is watch over the mascots and make sure they stay in good condition over the course of the week. Sounds easy, right? Only problem is the characters Do not like you and They want to attack you so uhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh lol yeah this game is very hard you will dies
